steps_new.one: Copy the phone number and go to your bank application
steps_new.two: Make the transfer using the card number
steps_new.onePhone: Copy the phone number and go to your bank app
steps_new.twoPhone: Make a transfer using the phone number

steps_transgran.tbank: Select SBP transfer|Paste the copied phone number|Enter the bank specified in the payment form|Enter the exact amount specified on the website|Press the button to complete the payment
steps_transgran.sberbank: Select transfer by phone number/to another country|Select the country - {{country}}|Go to the "To card or account" button|Paste the copied phone number|Enter the bank specified in the payment form|Enter the exact amount specified on the website|Press the button to complete the payment
steps_transgran.vtbbank: Open the 'Payments' section|Select 'To another country'|Choose '{{country}}' from the list|Select 'Transfer by phone number'|Choose the bank from the list as indicated above|Enter the phone number as indicated above|Press the 'Transfer' button

steps_azn.sberbank: Copy the specified phone number|Open the Sber app|Select the transfer by phone number function — "transfer to another country"|Then, in the app, specify the destination country — Azerbaijan|Paste the previously copied phone number|Select the specified bank from the available "E-wallet" list|Enter the exact amount specified on the website|Check the details and click the "Complete payment" button

steps_iban.iban: Copy the Iban Number|Open your bank app|Select the “Send Money” function|Next > Select the “Transfer to Another Recipient” function|In the “Recipient Details” window > Paste the previously copied Iban|Enter the recipient's “Last Name and First Name”|Enter the exact amount specified on the website|Check the details and click the “Confirm” button

title.transgran: Instruction for payment from the Russian Federation

steps_transgran_new.steps: Transfer to another country|Select country|Enter phone number|Select bank|Make payment

steps_transgran_abh.steps: Copy the phone number|In the Sber app, tap 'Transfer'|Select another country, then {{country}}|Paste the phone number|Select A-Mobile Wallet|Enter the amount {{amount}} and tap Approve

attention: Make a transfer to the bank and amount specified in the form. Otherwise, we do not guarantee the crediting.
